verses.verse: וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּשְׁכָּ֥ן <S%H4908><s%> the tabernacle תַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> Moreover thou shalt make עֶ֣שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> [with] ten יְרִיעֹ֑ת <S%H3407><s%> curtains שֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H8336><s%> linen מָשְׁזָ֗ר <S%H7806><s%> [of] fine twined וּתְכֵ֤לֶת <S%H8504><s%> and blue וְאַרְגָּמָן֙ <S%H713><s%> and purple וְתֹלַ֣עַת <S%H8438><s%> oppressor שָׁנִ֔י <S%H8144><s%> and scarlet כְּרֻבִ֛ים <S%H3742><s%> [with] cherubims מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> work חֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H2803><s%> of cunning תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> shalt thou make אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

אֹ֣רֶךְ ׀ <S%H753><s%> The length הַיְרִיעָ֣ה <S%H3407><s%> curtain הָֽאַחַ֗ת <S%H259><s%> of one שְׁמֹנֶ֤ה <S%H8083><s%> [shall be] eight וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <S%H6242><s%> and twenty בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> cubits וְרֹ֙חַב֙ <S%H7341><s%> and the breadth אַרְבַּ֣ע <S%H702><s%> four בָּאַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> cubits הַיְרִיעָ֖ה <S%H3407><s%> curtain הָאֶחָ֑ת <S%H259><s%> of one מִדָּ֥ה <S%H4060><s%> measure אַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> shall have one לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיְרִיעֹֽת׃ <S%H3407><s%> and every one of the curtains

חֲמֵ֣שׁ <S%H2568><s%> The five הַיְרִיעֹ֗ת <S%H3407><s%> curtains תִּֽהְיֶ֙יןָ֙ <S%H1961><s%> become חֹֽבְרֹ֔ת <S%H2266><s%> shall be coupled together אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֲחֹתָ֑הּ <S%H269><s%> to another וְחָמֵ֤שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and [other] five יְרִיעֹת֙ <S%H3407><s%> curtains חֹֽבְרֹ֔ת <S%H2266><s%> [shall be] coupled אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֲחֹתָֽהּ׃ <S%H269><s%> to another

וְעָשִׂ֜יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt make לֻֽלְאֹ֣ת <S%H3924><s%> loops תְּכֵ֗לֶת <S%H8504><s%> of blue עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> on שְׂפַ֤ת <S%H8193><s%> upon the edge הַיְרִיעָה֙ <S%H3407><s%> curtain הָאֶחָ֔ת <S%H259><s%> of the one מִקָּצָ֖ה <S%H7098><s%> from the selvedge בַּחֹבָ֑רֶת <S%H2279><s%> in the coupling וְכֵ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> and likewise תַּעֲשֶׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> and likewise shalt thou make בִּשְׂפַ֣ת <S%H8193><s%> edge הַיְרִיעָ֔ה <S%H3407><s%> of [another] curtain הַקִּ֣יצוֹנָ֔ה <S%H7020><s%> in the uttermost בַּמַּחְבֶּ֖רֶת <S%H4225><s%> in the coupling הַשֵּׁנִֽית׃ <S%H8145><s%> of the second

חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> Fifty לֻֽלָאֹ֗ת <S%H3924><s%> loops תַּעֲשֶׂה֮ <S%H6213><s%> shalt thou make בַּיְרִיעָ֣ה <S%H3407><s%> curtain הָאֶחָת֒ <S%H259><s%> in the one וַחֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> and fifty לֻֽלָאֹ֗ת <S%H3924><s%> loops תַּעֲשֶׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> shalt thou make בִּקְצֵ֣ה <S%H7097><s%> in the edge הַיְרִיעָ֔ה <S%H3407><s%> of the curtain אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> after בַּמַּחְבֶּ֣רֶת <S%H4225><s%> that [is] in the coupling הַשֵּׁנִ֑ית <S%H8145><s%> of the second מַקְבִּילֹת֙ <S%H6901><s%> may take hold הַלֻּ֣לָאֹ֔ת <S%H3924><s%> that the loops אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֲחֹתָֽהּ׃ <S%H269><s%> of another

וְעָשִׂ֕יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt make חֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <S%H2572><s%> fifty קַרְסֵ֣י <S%H7165><s%> taches זָהָ֑ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold וְחִבַּרְתָּ֨ <S%H2266><s%> and couple אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיְרִיעֹ֜ת <S%H3407><s%> the curtains אִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H802><s%> to one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֲחֹתָהּ֙ <S%H269><s%> with בַּקְּרָסִ֔ים <S%H7165><s%> the taches וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <S%H4908><s%> tabernacle אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> and it shall be one פ

וְעָשִׂ֙יתָ֙ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt make יְרִיעֹ֣ת <S%H3407><s%> curtains עִזִּ֔ים <S%H5795><s%> [of] goats' לְאֹ֖הֶל <S%H168><s%> [hair] to be a covering עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן <S%H4908><s%> upon the tabernacle עַשְׁתֵּי־ <S%H6249><s%> eleven עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <S%H6240><s%> ten יְרִיעֹ֖ת <S%H3407><s%> curtains תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> shalt thou make אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

אֹ֣רֶךְ ׀ <S%H753><s%> The length הַיְרִיעָ֣ה <S%H3407><s%> curtain הָֽאַחַ֗ת <S%H259><s%> of one שְׁלֹשִׁים֙ <S%H7970><s%> [shall be] thirty בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> cubits וְרֹ֙חַב֙ <S%H7341><s%> and the breadth אַרְבַּ֣ע <S%H702><s%> four בָּאַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> cubits הַיְרִיעָ֖ה <S%H3407><s%> curtain הָאֶחָ֑ת <S%H259><s%> of one מִדָּ֣ה <S%H4060><s%> measure אַחַ֔ת <S%H259><s%> [shall be all] of one לְעַשְׁתֵּ֥י <S%H6249><s%> eleven עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <S%H6240><s%> ten יְרִיעֹֽת׃ <S%H3407><s%> curtains

וְחִבַּרְתָּ֞ <S%H2266><s%> And thou shalt couple אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲמֵ֤שׁ <S%H2568><s%> five הַיְרִיעֹת֙ <S%H3407><s%> curtains לְבָ֔ד <S%H905><s%> themselves וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> by themselves and six הַיְרִיעֹ֖ת <S%H3407><s%> curtains לְבָ֑ד <S%H905><s%> themselves וְכָפַלְתָּ֙ <S%H3717><s%> by themselves and shalt double אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיְרִיעָ֣ה <S%H3407><s%> curtain הַשִּׁשִּׁ֔ית <S%H8345><s%> the sixth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מ֖וּל <S%H4136><s%> against פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> the front הָאֹֽהֶל׃ <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle

וְעָשִׂ֜יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt make חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> fifty לֻֽלָאֹ֗ת <S%H3924><s%> loops עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> on שְׂפַ֤ת <S%H8193><s%> on the edge הַיְרִיעָה֙ <S%H3407><s%> curtain הָֽאֶחָ֔ת <S%H259><s%> of the one הַקִּיצֹנָ֖ה <S%H7020><s%> [that is] outmost בַּחֹבָ֑רֶת <S%H2279><s%> in the coupling וַחֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> and fifty לֻֽלָאֹ֗ת <S%H3924><s%> loops עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> on שְׂפַ֣ת <S%H8193><s%> in the edge הַיְרִיעָ֔ה <S%H3407><s%> of the curtain הַחֹבֶ֖רֶת <S%H2279><s%> which coupleth הַשֵּׁנִֽית׃ <S%H8145><s%> the second

וְעָשִׂ֛יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt make קַרְסֵ֥י <S%H7165><s%> taches נְחֹ֖שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> of brass חֲמִשִּׁ֑ים <S%H2572><s%> fifty וְהֵבֵאתָ֤ <S%H935><s%> and put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַקְּרָסִים֙ <S%H7165><s%> the taches בַּלֻּ֣לָאֹ֔ת <S%H3924><s%> into the loops וְחִבַּרְתָּ֥ <S%H2266><s%> and couple אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֹ֖הֶל <S%H168><s%> the tent וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> will be a אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> together that it may be one

וְסֶ֙רַח֙ <S%H5629><s%> And the remnant הָעֹדֵ֔ף <S%H5736><s%> that remaineth בִּירִיעֹ֖ת <S%H3407><s%> of the curtains הָאֹ֑הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tent חֲצִ֤י <S%H2677><s%> the half הַיְרִיעָה֙ <S%H3407><s%> curtain הָעֹדֶ֔פֶת <S%H5736><s%> that remaineth תִּסְרַ֕ח <S%H5628><s%> shall hang עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> over אֲחֹרֵ֥י <S%H268><s%> over the backside הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <S%H4908><s%> of the tabernacle

וְהָאַמָּ֨ה <S%H520><s%> And a cubit מִזֶּ֜ה <S%H2088><s%> on the one side וְהָאַמָּ֤ה <S%H520><s%> and a cubit מִזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> side בָּעֹדֵ֔ף <S%H5736><s%> on the other side of that which remaineth בְּאֹ֖רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> in the length יְרִיעֹ֣ת <S%H3407><s%> of the curtains הָאֹ֑הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tent יִהְיֶ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become סָר֜וּחַ <S%H5628><s%> it shall hang עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over צִדֵּ֧י <S%H6654><s%> over the sides הַמִּשְׁכָּ֛ן <S%H4908><s%> of the tabernacle מִזֶּ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> the other וּמִזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> one לְכַסֹּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H3680><s%> on this side and on that side to cover

וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt make מִכְסֶה֙ <S%H4372><s%> a covering לָאֹ֔הֶל <S%H168><s%> for the tent עֹרֹ֥ת <S%H5785><s%> skins אֵילִ֖ם <S%H352><s%> [of] rams' מְאָדָּמִ֑ים <S%H119><s%> dyed red וּמִכְסֵ֛ה <S%H4372><s%> and a covering עֹרֹ֥ת <S%H5785><s%> skins תְּחָשִׁ֖ים <S%H8476><s%> [of] badgers' מִלְמָֽעְלָה׃ <S%H4605><s%> above פ

וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַקְּרָשִׁ֖ים <S%H7175><s%> boards לַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן <S%H4908><s%> for the tabernacle עֲצֵ֥י <S%H6086><s%> wood שִׁטִּ֖ים <S%H7848><s%> [of] shittim עֹמְדִֽים׃ <S%H5975><s%> standing up

עֶ֥שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> Ten אַמּ֖וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits אֹ֣רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> [shall be] the length הַקָּ֑רֶשׁ <S%H7175><s%> of a board וְאַמָּה֙ <S%H520><s%> and a cubit וַחֲצִ֣י <S%H2677><s%> and a half הָֽאַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> cubits רֹ֖חַב <S%H7341><s%> [shall be] the breadth הַקֶּ֥רֶשׁ <S%H7175><s%> board הָאֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> of one

שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> Two יָד֗וֹת <S%H3027><s%> tenons לַקֶּ֙רֶשׁ֙ <S%H7175><s%> board הָאֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> [shall there be] in one מְשֻׁלָּבֹ֔ת <S%H7947><s%> set in order אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֲחֹתָ֑הּ <S%H269><s%> against another כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> thus תַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> thus shalt thou make לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> for all קַרְשֵׁ֥י <S%H7175><s%> for all the boards הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <S%H4908><s%> of the tabernacle

וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַקְּרָשִׁ֖ים <S%H7175><s%> the boards לַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן <S%H4908><s%> for the tabernacle עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty קֶ֔רֶשׁ <S%H7175><s%> boards לִפְאַ֖ת <S%H6285><s%> side נֶ֥גְבָּה <S%H5045><s%> on the south תֵימָֽנָה׃ <S%H8486><s%> southward

וְאַרְבָּעִים֙ <S%H705><s%> forty אַדְנֵי־ <S%H134><s%> sockets כֶ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver תַּעֲשֶׂ֕ה <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt make תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> under עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> under the twenty הַקָּ֑רֶשׁ <S%H7175><s%> boards שְׁנֵ֨י <S%H8147><s%> two אֲדָנִ֜ים <S%H134><s%> sockets תַּֽחַת־ <S%H8478><s%> under הַקֶּ֤רֶשׁ <S%H7175><s%> board הָאֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> under one לִשְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> for his two יְדֹתָ֔יו <S%H3027><s%> tenons וּשְׁנֵ֧י <S%H8147><s%> and two אֲדָנִ֛ים <S%H134><s%> sockets תַּֽחַת־ <S%H8478><s%> under הַקֶּ֥רֶשׁ <S%H7175><s%> board הָאֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> under another לִשְׁתֵּ֥י <S%H8147><s%> for his two יְדֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H3027><s%> tenons

וּלְצֶ֧לַע <S%H6763><s%> side הַמִּשְׁכָּ֛ן <S%H4908><s%> of the tabernacle הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית <S%H8145><s%> And for the second לִפְאַ֣ת <S%H6285><s%> side צָפ֑וֹן <S%H6828><s%> on the north עֶשְׂרִ֖ים <S%H6242><s%> [there shall be] twenty קָֽרֶשׁ׃ <S%H7175><s%> boards

וְאַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> And their forty אַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H134><s%> sockets כָּ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> [of] silver שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> two אֲדָנִ֗ים <S%H134><s%> sockets תַּ֚חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הַקֶּ֣רֶשׁ <S%H7175><s%> board הָֽאֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> under one וּשְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> and two אֲדָנִ֔ים <S%H134><s%> sockets תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הַקֶּ֥רֶשׁ <S%H7175><s%> board הָאֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> under another

וּֽלְיַרְכְּתֵ֥י <S%H3411><s%> And for the sides הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <S%H4908><s%> of the tabernacle יָ֑מָּה <S%H3220><s%> westward תַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> thou shalt make שִׁשָּׁ֥ה <S%H8337><s%> six קְרָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H7175><s%> boards

וּשְׁנֵ֤י <S%H8147><s%> And two קְרָשִׁים֙ <S%H7175><s%> boards תַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> shalt thou make לִמְקֻצְעֹ֖ת <S%H4742><s%> for the corners הַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן <S%H4908><s%> of the tabernacle בַּיַּרְכָתָֽיִם׃ <S%H3411><s%> in the two sides

וְיִֽהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> shall form תֹֽאֲמִים֮ <S%H8382><s%> And they shall be coupled מִלְּמַטָּה֒ <S%H4295><s%> together beneath וְיַחְדָּ֗ו <S%H3162><s%> together יִהְי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> shall form תַמִּים֙ <S%H8535><s%> shall be complete עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto רֹאשׁ֔וֹ <S%H7218><s%> above the head אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַטַּבַּ֖עַת <S%H2885><s%> ring הָאֶחָ֑ת <S%H259><s%> of it unto one כֵּ֚ן <S%H3651><s%> thus יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> shall form לִשְׁנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H8147><s%> thus shall it be for them both לִשְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> they shall be for the two הַמִּקְצֹעֹ֖ת <S%H4740><s%> corners יִהְיֽוּ׃ <S%H1961><s%> shall form

וְהָיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> become שְׁמֹנָ֣ה <S%H8083><s%> And they shall be eight קְרָשִׁ֔ים <S%H7175><s%> boards וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H134><s%> and their sockets כֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> [of] silver שִׁשָּׁ֥ה <S%H8337><s%> six עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> teen אֲדָנִ֑ים <S%H134><s%> sockets שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> two אֲדָנִ֗ים <S%H134><s%> sockets תַּ֚חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הַקֶּ֣רֶשׁ <S%H7175><s%> board הָאֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> under one וּשְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> and two אֲדָנִ֔ים <S%H134><s%> sockets תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הַקֶּ֥רֶשׁ <S%H7175><s%> board הָאֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> under another

וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt make בְרִיחִ֖ם <S%H1280><s%> bars עֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <S%H7848><s%> [of] shittim חֲמִשָּׁ֕ה <S%H2568><s%> five לְקַרְשֵׁ֥י <S%H7175><s%> for the boards צֶֽלַע־ <S%H6763><s%> side הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <S%H4908><s%> of the tabernacle הָאֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> of the one

וַחֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H2568><s%> And five בְרִיחִ֔ם <S%H1280><s%> bars לְקַרְשֵׁ֥י <S%H7175><s%> for the boards צֶֽלַע־ <S%H6763><s%> side הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <S%H4908><s%> of the tabernacle הַשֵּׁנִ֑ית <S%H8145><s%> of the other וַחֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H2568><s%> and five בְרִיחִ֗ם <S%H1280><s%> bars לְקַרְשֵׁי֙ <S%H7175><s%> for the boards צֶ֣לַע <S%H6763><s%> of the side הַמִּשְׁכָּ֔ן <S%H4908><s%> of the tabernacle לַיַּרְכָתַ֖יִם <S%H3411><s%> for the two sides יָֽמָּה׃ <S%H3220><s%> westward
